languages.text: {n}Лицо мужчины до предела натягивается на креплениях, изображая крайнюю оскорбленность.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, попрошу без наговоров! Возможно, я не привык вести беседы на столь высоком уровне, но поверьте, я определенно губернатор Тассеры!"

{n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо мужчины до предела натягивается на креплениях, изображая крайнюю оскорбленность.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, попрошу без наговоров! Возможно, я не привык вести беседы на столь высоком уровне, но поверьте, я определенно губернатор Тассеры!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The man's face is stretched on the mounts to its limit, portraying extreme offence.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!, I ask that you do not insult me! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me, I am definitely the Governor of Thassera!"

{n}The man's face is stretched on the mounts to its limit, portraying extreme offence.{/n} "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!, I ask that you do not insult me! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me, I am definitely the Governor of Thassera!"

{n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

{n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

{n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

{n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

languages.text: {n}眼前男人的脸几乎已经要绷裂了，摆出了一幅被深深冒犯到的表情。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊！我请求您，不要再这样侮辱我了！或许我确实不太擅长如此高端的谈话，但请您相信，我确实是塔瑟拉的总督！如假包换！”
languages.original_text: {n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前男人的脸几乎已经要绷裂了，摆出了一幅被深深冒犯到的表情。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊！我请求您，不要再这样侮辱我了！或许我确实不太擅长如此高端的谈话，但请您相信，我确实是塔瑟拉的总督！如假包换！”

languages.text: {n}El rostro del hombre se estira hasta el límite de sus costuras en señal de que se siente muy ofendido.{/n} «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Le ruego que no me insulte de ese modo! Puede que no esté acostumbrado a conversar con altos dignatarios, ¡pero créame cuando le digo que soy el verdadero gobernador de Thassera!».
languages.original_text: {n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del hombre se estira hasta el límite de sus costuras en señal de que se siente muy ofendido.{/n} «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Le ruego que no me insulte de ese modo! Puede que no esté acostumbrado a conversar con altos dignatarios, ¡pero créame cuando le digo que soy el verdadero gobernador de Thassera!».

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo'nun suratı, derin bir kırgınlık belirtisi olarak gerilebildiği kadar geriliyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Rica ediyorum şahsıma hakaret etmeyin! Bu tür yüce konuşmalara pek alışkın değilim. Ancak inanın bana, ben Thassera'nın valisiyim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo'nun suratı, derin bir kırgınlık belirtisi olarak gerilebildiği kadar geriliyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Rica ediyorum şahsıma hakaret etmeyin! Bu tür yüce konuşmalara pek alışkın değilim. Ancak inanın bana, ben Thassera'nın valisiyim!"

languages.text: {n}男の顔は限界まで伸びて、強い攻撃的な兆候を見せる。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}！私をそのように侮辱しないでいただきたいのです！私はそのような高慢な会話には慣れていないかもしれませんが、信じてください、私は確かにタッセーラの総督なのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男の顔は限界まで伸びて、強い攻撃的な兆候を見せる。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}！私をそのように侮辱しないでいただきたいのです！私はそのような高慢な会話には慣れていないかもしれませんが、信じてください、私は確かにタッセーラの総督なのです！」

languages.text: {n}Son visage s'étire à l'extrême, signe qu'il se sent profondément offensé.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Je vous en prie, ne m'insultez pas de la sorte ! Je n'ai peut-être pas l'habitude des conversations aussi raffinées, mais croyez-moi, je suis bel et bien le gouverneur de Thassera ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage s'étire à l'extrême, signe qu'il se sent profondément offensé.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Je vous en prie, ne m'insultez pas de la sorte ! Je n'ai peut-être pas l'habitude des conversations aussi raffinées, mais croyez-moi, je suis bel et bien le gouverneur de Thassera ! »

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Mannes verzerrt sich so weit es seine Befestigungen zulassen. Er ist offenbar zutiefst beleidigt.{/n} "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin} ..." Ich verbitte mir derartige Beleidigungen! Ich mag es nicht gewohnt sein, derart vornehme Gespräche zu führen, aber ich versichere Euch, ich bin der Gouverneur von Thassera!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man's face becomes stretched to the limit on its fastenings, signalling deep offence.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I ask that you do not insult me so! I may not be used to having such lofty conversations, but believe me: I am definitely the governor of Thassera!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Mannes verzerrt sich so weit es seine Befestigungen zulassen. Er ist offenbar zutiefst beleidigt.{/n} "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin} ..." Ich verbitte mir derartige Beleidigungen! Ich mag es nicht gewohnt sein, derart vornehme Gespräche zu führen, aber ich versichere Euch, ich bin der Gouverneur von Thassera!"
